description: Extract strongly connected components of directed graphs. Graphviz filters: acyclic, bcomps, comps, edgepaint, gvcolor, gvpack, mingle, nop, sccmap, tred, & unflatten. More information: https://www.graphviz.org/pdf/sccmap.1.pdf.

useCases.description: Extract strongly connected components of one or more directed graphs:
Print statistics about a graph, producing no output graph:
